Half-Life is one of those games that can't really be lumped into a single category (i.e. FPS, Horror, etc). It is a lot of things and to get a sense of what Half_life is all about, you really have to play the game for yourself. That being said, it is one of the greatest games I have ever played. There are some points where it is difficult to figure out what to do, but that is part of the fun. If you want a click and shoot game, go play Call of Duty. Half-Life is like one great adventure that you can relive over and over again. It is the first game in what can only be described as an epic. The graphics are a bit dated but don't let that stop you from purchasing the game (besides, it is only 99 cents on sale). It will probably take 20 hours or so to beat the game your first time around, but the experience will be worth it.

Uno dei migliori giochi mai provati. La storia è un capolavoro, i personaggi sono fatti come si deve ma c'è un problema.
Ho riscontrato dei problemi con la creazione di un server privato e la conessione ad altri pubblici. Se possibile, da risolvere immediatamente. Consiglio a tutti di provare questo giocone, veramente bello e intressante.

С момента выхода этой игры прошло 20 лет. И в честь юбилея серии я решил таки пройти первую часть. Узнать с чего же все начиналось. И могу с уверенностью сказать, что проверку временем игра для меня прошла. Играется очень бодро. Быстрый, в меру сложный шутер от первого лица с добавлением простеньких физических головоломок. Уже в то время в Half-life имелся интригующий сюжет, который хоть и кажется немного простоватым на фоне второй части, но все равно заставлял задумываться  о некоторых вещах. В основном для меня вся интрига держалась на G-manе(историю которого мы похоже так никогда и не узнаем).
Саундтрек определенно заслуживает внимания. У меня в определенный момент забегали мурашки, когда я услышал мелодию, которая теперь украшает вступительный логотип Valve. Периодически начинает играть динамичное техно. И оно практически так же прекрасно, как и саунд к ремейку Doom.
В игре имеется богатый набор противников и орудий их умерщвления. Особенно радуют старые добрые хэдкрабы и ультразвуковые песики.
Не хочу показаться занудой, но сейчас такого уже действительно не делают. Переплюнуть в ламповости и разнообразии Half-life смогли лишь немногие шутеры (в основном с этой задачей лучше всего справился сиквел). Это очень приятная и с душой сделанная игра. Надеюсь, что Valve когда-нибудь вернется к разработке полноценных игр и мы увидим подобные шедевры еще раз

打包买的，建议买合集，打折的时候和白送没什么区别。
半条命真的是个好游戏，可以说具有划时代意义的FPS游戏，虽然说以现在的眼光来看画面粗糙，但是怪物们的设计却十分出色，冷不防冲出来一只大眼怪着实能吓人一跳。
但是我觉得，补票可以，怀一怀旧玩玩也不错，但是如果你之前并没有玩过这个游戏而从比较现代的FPS开始玩了的话。这游戏我个人不太建议游玩，毕竟当时技术有限，枪械判定并没有现在这般科学。因此习惯了现代游戏的玩家铁定会玩着玩着跳脚。这游戏你会发现敌人射哪儿都一样，不会存在什么用技术的环节，就是拿着枪往对方身上招呼就是了，没有爆头也没有这个那个技术流。我相信有大神会玩的很好，但是我这种手残党无伤通关在这游戏里是根本不可能。视频通通关就可以了。
而且既然你买了合集，半条命2是一个游戏体验完美的作品，你为什么不去玩半条命2捏？
最后，感觉这辈子不指望3了。

Half-Life is one of the best games in gaming history and I fully agree with anyone if they say that their favourite game is Half-Life. But the only thing that bothers me is that the graphics look really old and I wish that Valve could update the graphics, and not spend their whole time making hats in TF2.

For a game that was made in '97 I was suprised by how much I enjoyed it and how it has held up over time. Yes, there are some flaws (it was '97 how could there not be?) but overall I had fun. The only con I can really think of is the length. At some point it just seemed to drag on. Go here, kill everything, solve a puzzle, rinse and repeat but I magine back when this was made people didn't care because they were blown away by what they were experiencing and the length being a con is just a personal opinion. I look forward to playing the second one.

Una joya de juego. Si puedes ignorar los graficos viejos (pero pasables, no estan tan mal) es super recomendado este juego. LO BUENO:
- Buena historia que deja con ganas de mas
- Las actuaciones de voz son buenas, en espñol o ingles.
- Buen balance entre accion y acertijos.
- Los acertijos son muy creativos y han envejecido bien con el tiempo para nada se sienten como ideas viejas y eso por si solo me impresiono.

LO MALO:
- Tiene varios bugs, en dos ocaciones tuve que cargar la mision en un save file anterior y reiniciar la pc para poder pasar esa parte porque literal era un bug del juego.
- Graficos que si ya se ven un poco outdated pero pues es de esperarse.

It's a classic one, the mechanics are simple and really old, but you will have fun playing one of the first game of the genre. It's far from being the best game ever made, but for his time, it was pretty good tho.

Graphics 12/20 : With the graphic update it looks ok, it's very good for 1998.
Gameplay 15/20 : Environnement hitbox is a bit random, but there are a lot of cool weapons. Level design is great.
AI 10/20 : Ennemies are dumb. It helps when you want to finish the game in difficulty level, but I'im pretty sure some games if its era did better.
Soundtrack 12/20 : Pretty cool, get you in the mood of firing at E.T. and soldiers.
Storyline 16/20 : It feels very empty in the middle of the game, but the beginning and the end are pretty catchy, you want to know more about half-life's universe.

Overall 14/20 : For 10-15 hours of game, it's worth it, great game, with a cool storyline, really deserves a try ! Enjoy !

Half-Life is a great game. I really liked the story of it, and now i'm hooked to it. This type of run and gun gameplay paired with an excellent setting with the constant threat of running out of ammo, armor, and health leads to an amazing experience. The soundtrack for this game is also amazing. It also helps that the ai in this game aren't brain dead. This is easily one of the best shooters of all time in my opinion. It's everything a good shooter should be. This, along with Black Mesa and Half-Life 2 are must haves. If you are too scared to spend money on this, try playing Sven Co-op first, it's basically free multiplayer Half-Life.

Este juego es uno de los juegos que marco mi infancia, y que seguire jugando siempre. Porque este juego lleva distintas cosas que lo hacen especial, como la historia profunda que tiene, la increible jugabilidad que hace los combates entretenidos, la banda sonora que siempre me gusta volver a escuchar, el mappeo que con el motor grafico que tiene con el que ha logrado muchas cosas, y mas...

Acerca del multiplayer, pues, no lo jugue tanto, pero debo decir que es muy bueno para pasar el rato con amigos o con gente aleatoria, me entretiene mucho la verdad.

Con los mods, debo decir que la comunidad de mods es GRANDE, hay muchos mods, con los cuales siempre tendras una experiencia distinta, inclusive hay mods que no tienen que ver nada con Half-Life pero son demasiado buenos, excelentes.

Recomiendo este juego? Totalmente al 100%

I'm not going to go into to much detail about why it's good as many other already have, but I just want to say that while the game isn't perfect, it's as solid as Titanium and worth the price, especially if you can get it on sale.

Let me get the negatives over with.

-Compared to modern graphics, it's certainly not a looker

-Platforming segments can be a bit annoying, Be thankful for quicksave

- [Edit] Okay, so I'm a bit of an idiot. I thought that the flashlight actually drained from your suit's enery rather than it's own energy which recharges automatically. The reason I thout this was because, during the tutorial, the game said it "Drains power" so be sure to turn it off. That, plus the fact that suit energy items were introduced just before and during the flashlight tutorial sewgment lead me to believe it used suit power, so my mistake..........flashlight is still crappy though.

-there's some glitches that I experienced, some more than once. For instance, when transitioning from one level to another, I ended up in this pitch black room with a table and no way of doing anything. no idea why. but I was stuck unil I reloaded and traid again twice before it transitioned me to the next level.
 Another time I got stuck in a pipe while crawling through to another area as soon as the new area loads, cause I was off center while crawling through, again, had to reload just before and do it again three time before it worked right. Did I mention how great quicksave is?

Now for the positives
+everything else

well, that was quick.
Really, despite the negatives I listed, the game is solidly made, with engaging gameplay and story and a variety of enemies and obstacles to face, with plenty of different weapons to face them. It's a very absorbing experience, and I'd strongly recommend it to anyone who enjoys old-school shooters and sci-fi games.

My only other niggle, and this is controversial for me, is that tha game has a tendency of not making pathes and objectives clear. Now I myself didn't need any help beating the game and hardly got stuck for more than a few minutes at any point, but I can see where some people may get turned around, or have no idea how to progress further. Nothing is mapped out for you. There's not objective markers, no HUD map, and no clearly marked interactables. you need to figure out how to progress with what NPCs tell you, and with the knowledge at hand.

 On the one hand, this gives a great sense of organic exploration and makes the environments feel more open, but on the other hand, again, I can see where another person might get stuck for a while, not knowing what to do or how to progress. My advice is to keep an open mind, explore thoroughly, and save regularly..........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................Oh, and release Half-Life 3 already Valve!

Half-Life è uno di quei giochi rimasti nella storia del mondo videoludico e praticamente non c'è nessun giocatore che non ne conosca l'esistenza; io colpevolmente non ci avevo mai giocato, ho quindi sfruttato gli sconti di Steam per acquistarlo. Il gioco è ovviamente datato, ma è divertente da giocare ed ha una buona trama. Lo consiglio sia perchè mi sono divertito a giocarlo e sia perchè è un must videoludico a cui non si può non giocare.
Where is HL3

Half Life was always a game I heard about that everyone told me was great, but when they told me what it was like it didn't sound special, so years later when I finally got the chance to play it I was expecting a very generic fps with basic level design, I was wrong, and I'm happy I was wrong, I now truly see why this is considered one of the best games ever made, I enjoyed every second of this game, even the parts that frustrated me to no end.

Things I liked about the game
#1 A.I., the A.I. impressed me the most, enemies werent just the plain generic idiots most games at the time, they would try to get the advantage and position themselves around you, the would go behind cover then throw grenades from an area that wasn't in your view to do major damage or kill you instantly, basically the A.I. is damn good.

#2 No cutscenes, the lack of any cutscenes was great, I really liked that the entire story was told in this way, I really haven't encountered many games that do this but I overall think more should do this as it makes the imersion better.

#3 Level design, the level design was good, it could've been better and its mostly because you spend most of the time in very basic looking labs with the occasional puzzle, but what I did like was that every area was very open, you could explore every inch and find weapons, ammo, health packs, and they could lead to an advantage point above the enemy.

#4 Weapon variety, there were more weapons in the game than I thought I knew there was the pistol, shotgun, assault rifle, and grenades, but finding the energy guns, magnum, and crossbow was not what I thought was in the game, I loved having a wide range of weapons to choose from.

#5 Story, the story was slow at first but as it went on to were the military was trying to take you and every employee out from Black Mesa, to finding out why the G Man was stalking you, the story was overall pretty damn good

#6 Graphics, for a game as old as this one it looks amazing, thats all I have to say about the graphics.

#7 Bosses, I know there wasnt alot of boss fights but for the ones that were there they were tough and and that feeling of pleasure after you kill on is the best thing feeling of all time.

8# Challenge, this game starts off very easy and I loved that with each new chapter it gets tougher and more challenging, I know thats what games are supposed to do, but this was perfectly done, you were always well prepared for whatever was coming your way.

#9 Music, the music was amazing, when you get into a fire fight it kicked it up and pumped you up, and when it wanted to fill you with wonder it was able to make it possible with little effort.

And now for the things I didnt like

1# The control, I honestly feel like the control was floaty and slippery, I could just suck at the game, but I honestly died more times from falling off a ledge or over shooting a jump, but to be fair by the end of the game you have basically master the controls and don't notice them any more, they feel natural.

And there you have it my thoughts on Half Life, would I recommend this game yes I would, this was better than I thought it would be, it did make me mad and frustrated but never to the point to were I wanted to stop playing, I enjoyed every moment, and wish this was one of the games from my childhood, I would've loved this back then like I do now.
Una obra maestra, algunas veces puede ser frustrante pero por algo existe la sala de entrenamiento y la seleccion de dificultad, en resumen, un gran juego, lo recomiendo absolutamnete
A true classic!
Chido

[h1]Half-Life 1[/h1]

Cóż mogę powiedzieć. Legendarny klasyk, który zrewolucjonizował w 1998 gatunek FPS ze względu na prowadzenie narracji. Mam nadzieję że nie muszę nikomu tej gry szczegółowo przedstawiać i każdy wie kto to Gordon Freeman i czym jest jego ulubione narzędzie zagłady.

Fabuła w dużym uproszczeniu dzieje się w kompleksie Black Mesa Research Facility, gdzie dochodzi do kaskady rezonansowej, czyli nieudanego eksperymentu na krysztale z obcego wymiaru, który spowodował rozdarcie czasoprzestrzeni i przenikanie naszego świata z innym o nazwie Xen. Gordon Freeman przemierza długie kilometry Black Mesy, aby dostać się do obcego świata, by zwalczyć pewną sympatyczną istotę, która podtrzymuje to połączenie z naszym wymiarem.

Bez wątpienia główną zaletą tej gry są jej mroczny, niepokojący klimat oraz różnorodność. Gra wcale nie wygląda mrocznie, ale wciąż czuć niebezpieczeństwo z każdej strony, co jest genialne. Naszymi wrogami jest wiele rodzajów kosmitów ze świata Xen oraz żołnierze, którzy zostali wysłani do BMRF, aby pozbyć się świadków tego okropnego zdarzenia i wymordować kosmitów. Niestety... im nie pykło. Inteligencja żołnierzy jest naprawdę imponująca, a już nawet nie porównam do tego tej głupiej ochrony cywilnej z Half-Life 2, za którym no nie przepadam. Jak na boomerowego shootera mamy również bogaty, bez żadnych ograniczeń w użytkowaniu arsenał składający się z 12 broni, w tym z ikonicznego łomu. Model strzelania jakoś dvpy nie urywa, w Quake 1 był znacznie lepszy, ale nie ma tragedii.

Następną zaletą niewątpliwie jest długość. Gra jest podzielona 19, tak naprawdę 17 rozdziałów, ponieważ jeden to wprowadzenie, a drugi to creditsy. Mapy może i są już dzisiaj bardzo kanciaste, ale wciąż mają niepowtarzalny zarąbisty design i klimatyczne oświetlenie, którego na próżno dzisiaj szukać w FPS'ach. O ile z rozdziałami dziejącymi się na Ziemi jest wszystko ok, to moment gry kiedy trafiamy na Xen jest kompletnie bez sensu. Dobra pierwszy i drugi rozdział na Xenie jest jeszcze w miarę, ale kiedy zaczyna się Interloper wszystko traci sens. Poziom trudności jest totalnie niezbalansowany i wszędzie latają te debilne controllery, które mega irytują. I od razu mówię żeby nie było że marudzę: Po latach sam Gabe Newell przyznał że te końcowe rozdziały to gigantyczne nieporozumienie i kpina oraz były robione w pośpiechu. Natomiast to co odwalili fani z Xenem w remake'u HL1 - Black Mesa - zasługuje wręcz na jakąś gamingową nagrodę Nobla. Ale o tym nie tutaj.

Z mniejszych rzeczy muzyka, która bardzo pasuje do klimatu gry i sytuacji dziejącej się aktualnie na ekranie. Szkoda tylko, że po zginięciu lub wczytaniu zapisu automatycznie się ona kończy i nic nie słychać. Oraz cieszy mnie to, że to chyba jeden z nielicznych starych FPS'ów od razu przystosowany do dzisiejszych komputerów. Nie trzeba się bawić w żadne nowe silniki itp. Wszystko od razu działa.

Podsumowując Half-Life 1, jest to obowiązek każdego fana boomerowych shooterów. Niestety jednak obawiam się, że jeśli nigdy nie grałeś w takie gry, takie coś może ci się nie spodobać. W takim razie lepiej kup Black Mesę, czyli wcześniej wspomniany remake HL1. Jest znacznie mniej archaiczny i o wiele bardziej przystosowany do dzisiejszych standardów, zarówno pod względem mechaniki jak i oprawy.

[h1]Zalety[/h1]
- Rewolucja
- Fabuła
- Różnodorność
- Mapy
- Arsenał
- AI
- Muzyka
- Od razu przystosowana do dzisiejszych komputerów

[h1]Wady[/h1]
- Rozdziały na Xen

[h1]9/10[/h1]

Что за бородатый мужик на оранжевом фоне? - подумал я, когда впервые увидел первую халф лайф.
Игра даже сегодня выглядит неплохо, не смотря на устаревшую графику. Это единственная игра от Valve, которую они сделали сами с нуля, она же и последняя. 
Хорошая атмосфера.....я хз что ещё написать о самой крутой игре за последние 20 лет! Она оригинальна, уровень взаимодействия с предметами получше чем в некоторых современных играх. Не буду спорить с хейтерами этой игры, она действительно бродилка, но не обычная, тут есть действительно отличный сюжет. 
В этом году Half-Life исполняется ровно 20 лет. Столько времени прошло, а её до сих пор помнят, играют, проходят. Мне зашло, лайк.
20 лет ожидания третьей части из 10

Old memory: this is good

Half-Life is still one of, if not, the best first-person shooters of this century.

As soon as you boot up the game you feel as if Valve are telling you that "This i sour game and we put our heart and soul into it". You play for an hour and you realise the PASSION. It's one of the best games you can get on Steam and for $10, what are you waiting for?

[spoiler]Rise and shine, Mister Freeman. Rise and... shine. Not that I... wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job. No-one is more deserving of a rest, and all the effort in the world have gone to waste until... well, let's just say your hour has... come again. [/spoiler]

The combat in this game is very fluent, and the puzzles are fun. Even with the great story, Half-Life also features a multiplayer mode similar to that of early Team Fortress 2 servers, with a somewhat active community. The story progresses in a satisfying way and all the weapons are fun and balanced.
